original_title: Adventures in Odyssey: Shadow of a Doubt
overview: There's a cat burglar on the prowl in Odyssey, one who looks a lot like . . . John Avery Whittaker! Could it be? Don't miss this action-packed mystery with laughs and thrills for the entire family! Precious gems unearthed behind Whit's End. Incriminating film from a surveillance camera. A soda glass found at the scene of the crimeâ€”with fingerprints! The evidence against Whit is overwhelming. But Dylan isn't so sure. And when he sets out to prove Whit's innocence, he gets more than he bargained for.
title: Adventures in Odyssey: Shadow of a Doubt
